descriptions:
Introducing the Squirrel House/Nesting Box, the perfect home for our furry friends! Crafted with high-quality cedar wood, this nesting box is designed for outdoor use, ensuring durability and longevity. 

Our construction experts have meticulously glued and nailed every piece together, guaranteeing a sturdy and reliable structure. To add a touch of artistry, we have burned a beautiful image of a squirrel on one side of the box, thanks to the talented artist Drew Senesac.

Cleaning and hanging the box is a breeze with our removable roof feature. Simply lift the roof off to access the interior for cleaning or to hang the box at your desired location. We even provide you with two screws and washers for easy mounting, so you can set up the box without any hassle.

The Squirrel House/Nesting Box is thoughtfully designed to cater to our furry friends' needs. The inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches provide a cozy and comfortable space for squirrels to nest and raise their young. The squirrel opening, measuring 3.5 inches in diameter, allows easy access for our adorable visitors.

With outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches, this nesting box is the perfect size to accommodate squirrels while blending seamlessly into your outdoor space. 

Invest in the Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and provide a safe and inviting haven for squirrels to call home. Give them the shelter they deserve and enjoy the pleasure of observing their playful antics. Order now and experience the joy of welcoming these delightful creatures into your backyard!

Introducing our Squirrel House/Nesting Box, the perfect addition to your outdoor space! Made from high-quality cedar wood, this nesting box is built to withstand the elements and provide a cozy home for squirrels. 

The construction of this box is top-notch, with glued and nailed joints ensuring durability and longevity. But what truly sets this box apart is the beautiful burned image of a squirrel on the wall, created by the talented artist Drew Senesac. This decorative feature adds a touch of charm and whimsy to your outdoor decor.

Cleaning and hanging the box is a breeze, thanks to the removable roof. Simply lift it off, clean the interior, and hang it back up. And to make installation even easier, we provide two screws and washers for mounting, so you can have it up and running in no time.

The dimensions of the box are as follows: outside dimensions of 12x11x10 inches, inside dimensions of 5.75x9 inches, and a squirrel opening of 3.5 inches. This ensures that there is plenty of space for squirrels to nest comfortably.

Don't miss out on this fantastic squirrel house/nesting box that combines functionality, durability, and artistic design. Provide a safe and cozy home for squirrels while adding a unique touch to your outdoor space. Order yours today and create a haven for these adorable creatures!

One of the standout features of this nesting box is the beautifully burned image of a squirrel on the wall, adding a delightful touch to any outdoor space. The removable roof ensures easy cleaning and convenient hanging, allowing you to maintain a comfortable and welcoming environment for the squirrels.

Inside, the dimensions are 5.75x9 inches, offering a cozy and snug environment. The squirrel opening has a diameter of 3.5 inches, providing the perfect size for squirrels to enter and exit comfortably.

Invest in our Squirrel House/Nesting Box today and create a haven for these adorable creatures in your backyard. With its durable construction, charming design, and convenient features, this squirrel house is a must-have for any nature lover.
